name: sahu_internship
description: Task is to make 3 Frontend UI of the provided templates

scripts.scss: node-sass -o css/template1/ css/template1/ && node-sass -o css/template13/ css/template13/ && node-sass -o css/template16/ css/template16/
scripts.imagemin: imagemin img/template1/* -o dist/img/template1 && imagemin img/template13/* -o dist/img/template13 && imagemin img/template16/* -o dist/img/template16
scripts.usemin: usemin template1.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/template1.html && usemin template13.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/template13.html && usemin template16.html -d dist --htmlmin -o dist/template16.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copyfonts && npm run imagemin && npm run usemin
